verses.verse: When I would have <S%H7495>healed<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> then the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> was <S%H1540>discovered,<s%> and the <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> they <S%H6466>commit<s%> <S%H8267>falsehood;<s%> and the <S%H1590>thief<s%> cometh <S%H935>in,<s%> and the troop of <S%H1416>robbers<s%> <S%H6584>spoileth<s%> <S%H2351>without.<s%>

And they <S%H559>consider<s%> <S%H1077>not<s%> in their <S%H3824>hearts<s%> that I <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H7451>wickedness:<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> their own <S%H4611>doings<s%> have beset them <S%H5437>about;<s%> they <S%H1961>are<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> my <S%H6440>face.<s%>
They make the king <S%H8055>glad<s%> <S%H4428><s%> with their <S%H7451>wickedness,<s%> and the <S%H8269>princes<s%> with their <S%H3585>lies.<s%>

They are <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5003>adulterers,<s%> <S%H3644>as<s%> an <S%H8574>oven<s%> <S%H1197>heated<s%> <S%H4480>by<s%> the <S%H644>baker,<s%> who <S%H7673>ceaseth<s%> from <S%H4480>raising<s%> <S%H5782><s%> after he hath <S%H4480>kneaded<s%> <S%H3888><s%> the <S%H1217>dough,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> it be <S%H2556>leavened.<s%>

In the <S%H3117>day<s%> of our <S%H4428>king<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> have made him <S%H2470>sick<s%> with <S%H2534>bottles<s%> of <S%H4480>wine;<s%> <S%H3196><s%> he stretched <S%H4900>out<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H3945>scorners.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> they have made <S%H7126>ready<s%> their <S%H3820>heart<s%> like an <S%H8574>oven,<s%> while they lie in <S%H693>wait:<s%> their <S%H644>baker<s%> <S%H3463>sleepeth<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3915>night;<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> <S%H1197>burneth<s%> as a <S%H3852>flaming<s%> <S%H784>fire.<s%>

They are all <S%H2552>hot<s%> <S%H3605><s%> as an <S%H8574>oven,<s%> and have <S%H398>devoured<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H8199>judges;<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4428>kings<s%> are <S%H5307>fallen:<s%> there is <S%H369>none<s%> among them that <S%H7121>calleth<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me.
Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> hath mixed <S%H1101>himself<s%> among the <S%H5971>people;<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H1961>is<s%> a <S%H5692>cake<s%> <S%H1097>not<s%> <S%H2015>turned.<s%>

Strangers <S%H2114><s%> have <S%H398>devoured<s%> his <S%H3581>strength,<s%> and <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> it <S%H3808>not:<s%> <S%H1571>yea,<s%> gray <S%H7872>hairs<s%> are here and <S%H2236>there<s%> upon him, yet <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> <S%H3808>not.<s%>

And the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6030>testifieth<s%> to his <S%H6440>face:<s%> and they do <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1245>seek<s%> him for <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2063>this.<s%>

Ephraim <S%H669><s%> also <S%H1961>is<s%> like a <S%H6601>silly<s%> <S%H3123>dove<s%> <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H3820>heart:<s%> they <S%H7121>call<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> they <S%H1980>go<s%> to <S%H804>Assyria.<s%>

When <S%H834><s%> they shall <S%H1980>go,<s%> I will <S%H6566>spread<s%> my <S%H7568>net<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> them; I will bring them <S%H3381>down<s%> as the <S%H5775>fowls<s%> of the <S%H8064>heaven;<s%> I will <S%H3256>chastise<s%> them, as their <S%H5712>congregation<s%> hath <S%H8088>heard.<s%>

Woe <S%H188><s%> unto them! <S%H3588>for<s%> they have <S%H5074>fled<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> me: <S%H7701>destruction<s%> unto them! <S%H3588>because<s%> they have <S%H6586>transgressed<s%> against me: though <S%H595>I<s%> have <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> them, yet <S%H1992>they<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H3577>lies<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me.

And they have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2199>cried<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me with their <S%H3820>heart,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> they <S%H3213>howled<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> their <S%H4904>beds:<s%> they assemble <S%H1481>themselves<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> <S%H1715>corn<s%> and <S%H8492>wine,<s%> and they <S%H5493>rebel<s%> against me.
Though <S%H589>I<s%> have <S%H3256>bound<s%> and <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> their <S%H2220>arms,<s%> yet do they <S%H2803>imagine<s%> <S%H7451>mischief<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> me.

They <S%H7725>return,<s%> but <S%H3808>not<s%> to the most <S%H5920>High:<s%> they <S%H1961>are<s%> like a <S%H7423>deceitful<s%> <S%H7198>bow:<s%> their <S%H8269>princes<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%> for the <S%H4480>rage<s%> <S%H2195><s%> of their <S%H3956>tongue:<s%> <S%H2097>this<s%> shall be their <S%H3933>derision<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
